column.name: Use or register a shared DB Connection
Share identity insert in multi table
Query
column.value: "SELECT dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.ORDER_NUMBER, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.CUSTOMERNAME, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.STATUS, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.ORDER_TYPE, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.CUSTOMER_NUMBER, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SALESPERSON, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.CUSTOMER_PO, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.DATE_ORDERED, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.REQUEST_DATE, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.PRICE_LIST, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIP_TO, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILL_TO, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.FOB, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.CURRENCY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.WAREHOUSE, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIPTO_ADDRESS1, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIPTO_ADDRESS2, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIPTO_CITY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIPTO_COUNTY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIPTO_STATE, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIPTO_COUNTRY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SHIPTO_POSTAL_CODE, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILLTO_ADDRESS1, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILLTO_ADDRESS2, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILLTO_CITY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILLTO_COUNTY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILLTO_STATE, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILLTO_COUNTRY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.BILLTO_POSTAL_CODE, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.TRX_NUMBER, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.ORDER_AMOUNT, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.AMOUNT_IN_USD, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SYS_CREATED, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SYS_CREATEDBY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SYS_LASTUPDATED, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SYS_LASTUPDBY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SFDC_ACCT_ID, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SFDC_ORDER_ID, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.EBS_LASTUPDBY_ID, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.SFDC_USER_NAME, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.LINE_STATUS, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.EBS_CREATED_BY, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.EBS_CREATEDBY_ID, dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.EBS_LASTUPDBY FROM dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS WHERE (len(dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.EBS_CREATEDBY_ID)>0 or (len(dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.EBS_LASTUPDBY_ID)>0) and dbo.EBS_SALESORDERS.EBS_LASTUPDBY != 'CONCURRENT')"
